moreBlocks.articles:
• Bankruptcy
    The attorneys at the Law Offices of Robert M. Stahl have more than 25 years of experience representing individual and business debtors in connection with bankruptcy.
  • Chapter 7 Bankruptcy
    Chapter 7 bankruptcy, often called a liquidation or straight bankruptcy, is the most common type of bankruptcy proceeding.
  • Chapter 11
    Contact our Chapter 11 Bankruptcy Maryland Attorney.
  • Chapter 13 Bankruptcy
    Chapter 13 Bankruptcy is a way for people to "reorganize" their debt into a manageable, monthly payment plan that is fair for the individual's creditors.
  • Tax Controversy
    We provide aggressive, experienced legal representation before the Internal Revenue Service and state tax agencies for audits, IRS collection matters, criminal investigations, and tax court litigation.

description:
Law Offices of Robert M. Stahl, LLC, in Bel Air, Maryland, provides experienced legal representation for bankruptcy and tax litigation matters. Our law firm serves clients in the city of Baltimore, and in Harford County, Carroll County, Baltimore County and Howard County through our six convenient locations.

Our bankruptcy litigation includes representation for both personal bankruptcy, through Chapter 7 or 13, and business bankruptcy, through Chapter 11. Our law firm also provides aggressive representation for audits, collection matters, criminal investigations, and tax court litigation before the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) and state tax agencies.

Attorney Robert Stahl has more than 20 years of legal experience, as well as more than 30 years as a certified public accountant (CPA). This allows him to skillfully lead our legal team in successfully resolving our clients' extreme debt and tax issues. We have been helping individual and business debtors with bankruptcy and tax concerns since 1983 and are dedicated to achieving the best possible outcome for every client.

Law Offices of Robert M. Stahl, LLC, can help you to free yourself from debt or tax problems. Contact our law firm today for a free initial consultation. We accept all major credit cards and evening and weekend appointments are available upon request.
